name: Cheese Thief
description:
This is a simple platformer where you are a mouse and must steal cheese! Don't get caught by the patrolling cats though. Each level features a different kitchen interior for fun gameplay. This game was made for the Community Peanut Butter Game Jam [1]. I hope you guys like it! :)

*I did use some dirt and grass tiles that I premade. 

*Music by: David O'Burke
